item.title: Could the government shutdown tip the US into a recession? Experts weigh in
item.description: The U.S. economy remains largely unscathed but pressure could mount.

item.title: Trump says he's terminating trade talks with Canada over TV ad about tariffs
item.description: President Donald Trump said he's terminating trade negotiations with Canada citing a negative TV advertisement about tariffs.

item.title: Florida mall heist: Thieves cut hole in mall roof, steal $50,000 in sneakers
item.description: Masked robbers cut a hole in the concrete roof of a Florida mall before dropping in to steal 400 to 500 pairs of Nike and New Balance sneakers Tuesday...

item.title: WATCH: American cattle ranchers push back against Trump's plan to import Argentine beef
item.description: American cattle ranchers are standing in firm opposition to President Trump's plan to "buy some beef from Argentina" amid soaring domestic beef prices...

item.title: LIVE: ABC News Live
item.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events
